(A)

The platting official may grant a variance from the dedication requirements of Section 30-3-25 (Dedication Of Right-Of-Way) if the platting official determines that the requirements:

(1)

place an undue hardship on the property owner because of special circumstances applicable
to the property; or

(2)

render the property unsuitable for an economically feasible use.

(B)

An applicant may appeal the denial of a variance to the council or commissioners court,
as appropriate.

Source: City Code Section 25-6-86 ; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
